text:
@Javedakhtarjadu Do not show your ignorance again and again Mr.Akthar. The guilty are being brought  to justice.Covid19 does not mean that Country and law & order come to a standstill.
Your brand of work is irrelevant but many Indians are working from home and contributing to the nation.
